name: lightning-network.public.dappnode.eth
description:
The Lightning Network DAppNodePackage (lnd + RTL). The Lightning Network is a decentralized system for instant, high-volume micropayments that remove the risk of delegating custody of funds to trusted third parties. 


 **Getting started** 

 Go to the [Lightning Network DAppNode Package readme](https://github.com/dappnode/DAppNodePackage-LightningNetwork#readme) to learn how to get started and safely backup your data.
author: Pablo
